title: (23600) Martos - 2F Calle Niño Jesús
description:
Large parking area with a long promenade with good views of the city and close to the old town so you can park and visit it on foot. There is also a recently built playground for the little ones. In winter it is usually quiet but in summer it is more crowded in the afternoons since people go up there to eat and hang out, taking advantage of the fact that due to its location there is usually a breeze and it is cooler than in the city. There are several food delivery establishments that have no problem delivering there, you just have to tell them that you are in the Paseo del Calvario parking lot. There is no sign restricting the use of motorhomes.

TO ACCESS YOU HAVE TO ENTER FROM THE HEALTH CENTER (C/Molino Medel) The other itineraries are too narrow

description: Cute picnic area next to the chapel and there are a few ruins. In the middle of nature, very calm, we spent a night there without problem. Lots of room but the ground is not very flat, we found a place at the top of the hill. Correct route to reach it.

title: (23740) Andújar - Santuario Virgen de la Cabeza
title_short: (23740) Andújar - Santuario Virgen de la Cabeza
description: Place near restaurant / apartments Los Pintos. Between the pinas on the right. In addition to the ruins of a villa. Some remote traffic noise. Designated by Information Center. (Other locations in the area not allowed)

title: (14812) Almedinilla - 33 Paseo Alameda
description: Information Point Parking to see the incredible ruins of El Ruedo, a Roman villa from the 1st century AD.

title: (23748) Andújar - A-6177
description: Mirador with a place and a superb view. Close to the road but quiet at night

title: (14812) Almedinilla - 1E Paseo Moreras
description: Site to leave without problems and spend the night. It is next to a park in general you have everything and it is a town with a lot of history it is recommended to go to the tourist office and ask for information

title: (23537) Bedmar - 10 Carretera Mancha Real a Cazorla
title_short: (23537) Bedmar - 10 Carretera Mancha Real a Cazorla
description: Parking in dirt but very passable with beautiful views of the mountains and olive groves. walk up about 200 m on the sidewalk and you arrive at a fountain, there you go through a park and you arrive at the main square. restaurant and shops. from there, continue up the small streets to the church and the remains of the castle. take good shoes because it climbs hard. good visit.

title: (23710) Bailén - Autovía del Sur
description: Rest area with gas station and cafeteria 24 hours, stop trucks

title: (14850) Baena - 88T Avenida Padre Villoslada
description: Parking with beautiful views of the town in a quiet neighborhood. Nearby there is a children's play area and a soccer field. Right next door there is a Carrefour with a gas station and a water outlet, as well as a car wash. It is right at the entrance of the town, close to the road.

title: (14812) Almedinilla - Calle Media Era, 1
description: Quiet and quite flat street, next to a gym park and soccer field. Near the municipal pool, ideal in summer. Without services. Perfect to visit Almedinilla and close to shops and bars that serve you free tapas. Almedinilla is beautiful, with fountains, flower patios and pretty trails. Its Iberian settlement, the Roman villa and the waterfall of the horse jumping to Fuente Grande is a must visit. We have spent three days here and great. It is a quiet and safe town.

title: (18561) Montejícar - Unnamed Road
description: To spend the night, very quiet.

title: (14816) La Concepción -
description: Quiet place, in flat

title: (23710) Bailén - Unnamed Road
description: Recreational area parking. Equipped with picnic areas and a water source (I don't know if it's drinkable)

name: Área recreativa Cuadros
title: (23537) Área recreativa Cuadros
description: At the end of the road, picnic area and free parking in the countryside, at the edge of a stream. A little paradise with WC on site (closed off season). No barrier in height. Up to 5 or 6 camper.

title: (23537) - JV-3222
description: Recreational area with ample parking (without restricting signs for the night), very quiet and clean. From the car park you have access to different routes: Torreón, Orio en Cuadros, Cueva del Agua, Río Cuadros, Adelfal and the Sanctuary of Pictures.

title: (23569) Bélmez de la Moraleda - JV-3224
description: Small esplanade behind the Gargantón bridge. Only for 2 or 3 vans. Larger motorhomes can have access problems. The site is spectacular and super quiet, from where many excursions to the heart of Sierra Mágina leave. Only for wild hearts !!! ;)

title: (14880) Luque - CO-6203
description: Cemetery parking. tranquility.  Other accessible parking in the center of the village but just for the visit not to be missed.

title: (23770) Marmolejo - A-420
description: Quiet recreational area with tables, a river and a "fountain of the socialists" as it appears on a sign, and that does not give water. Very quiet and suitable for motorhomes.

title: (14850) Baena - 1 Calle Guardia Civil
description: Esplanade stadium occupied by carnival during the holy week 2017 (April 12) we found this large parking near the high school, flat, cemented and very quiet (school holidays?) With bins and fallow land ideal for taking out the dog.

title: (14850) Baena - 1 Calle Iznajar
description: Paved parking for cars. No services. At 10 minutes from the center.

title: (23700) Linares - Calle Finca San José, 1
description: Parking close to the center. Sloping parking spaces. In the middle compartment space for large campers.

title: (14850) Baena - 38 Poligono Pau
description: Picnic site. Fairly flat. Bins. Good view of town. Best access is immediately beside Lidl on the edge of village. The road is single track with no passing places for about 400m. Well above the main road so fairly quiet.

title: (23700) Linares - 17 Paseo Virgen de Linarejos
description: Very large underground parking. Beside the paseo and a laundromat. Apparently we can not sleep at night in Linares. But very convenient for a step.

title: (14850) Baena - 30 Calle Demetrio de los Ríos
title_short: (14850) Baena - 30 Calle Demetrio de los Ríos
description: The car park, although slightly inclined, is close to the monumental area, quiet area next to a small park.

title: (14640) Villa del Río - 16 Carretera Madrid Cadiz
title_short: (14640) Villa del Río - 16 Carretera Madrid Cadiz
description: Small village super nice and very quiet, parking along a nice little park in the shade

title: (23700) Linares - P Virgen de Linarejos
description:
Paved esplanade with a water utility pole under repair.
It is marked as temporary parking for motorhomes.
Near the city center, on the promenade.
very nice city with atmosphere.

title: (23700) Linares - 2 Calle del Río Guadalén
description: According to local police, you can only stay one day. City ​​with many interesting things to see a pity that the town council prohibits the parking of motorhomes.

title: (14640) Villa del Río -
description: This is a car park that can take around 6 motorhomes without disturbing the locals. Slight distant road noise from the highway. Quiet town with some shops. The car park is on a good level paved surface and is well lit. Behind the car park there is a river. the small building that can be seen at the entrance is a churrería, wonderful for breakfast in the sun

title: (23440) Baeza - 17 Calle Al-Bayyasi
description: Large car park near the archaeological excavations overlooking the city. 2 minutes walk from the center. possible to sleep there

title: (23440) Baeza - s/n Calle Comunidad de Castilla y León
title_short: (23440) Baeza - s/n Calle Comunidad de Castilla y León
description: Parking in front of the Civil Guard Academy, so it is very safe to park, as well as the town itself. It is a large esplanade of land, with a supermarket opposite (Mercadona, with toilets inside) and several laundries. 15 minutes walk from the center. You can park both during the day and overnight. During the course of the guards (October / May) there are quite a few cars during the week, on weekends it is emptied. Children's play area and dirt soccer field. There are dirt roads that lead from there towards the olive groves, perfect for walking with dogs.

address.street: s/n Calle Comunidad de Castilla y León

title: (23440) Baeza - 24 Calle Miguel de Unamuno
description: laundromat

title: (23440) Baeza - 1 Calle Jurado
description: Great place to park and visit Baeza. Entrance may seem quite difficult for longer vehicles.

title: (23748) Andújar - A-6177

title: (23440) Baeza -

title: (23440) Baeza - 8 Paseo las Murallas
description: Easy to park. You don't have to cross narrow streets to get there. The main square can be reached within a 10-minute walk

title: (23748) Andújar - Unnamed Road
description: Very pretty place to make a campfire. There is a lot of place to park but not much space to park the car straight for the night... in this area you can spot Iberian lynxes and otters.

title: (23440) Baeza - 9 Calle Coca de la Piñera
title_short: (23440) Baeza - 9 Calle Coca de la Piñera
description: Good level parking space within walking distance of the center. Wall around it, but access for others possible. We have only visited the town.

title: (23440) Baeza - Calle Sierra de Segura

title: (23748) Andújar - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place to picnic

title: (23440) Baeza - 20 Calle Manuel Acero
description: Parking overnight ok

title: (23770) Marmolejo - A-420
description: Parking bay along side of road, gravel track that was fine for our van. overlooks the reservoir below and nice and quiet at night. amazing for star gazing! no services here and limited phone service

title: (23770) Marmolejo - A-420
description: Quiet at the edge of an artificial lake surrounded by olive trees. Large car park slightly sloping and without shade. Ok for motorhomes. No convenience. The path does not appear on the map but the GPS point is correct.

title: (23711) Baños de la Encina - J-5042

title: (23770) Marmolejo - A-420
description: Large land site, at the edge of the water. Quiet without water or services, without shade

title: (14870) Zuheros - CV-247
description: Parking in earth of the cave and eco museum. A bit of slope but very quiet and superb view. Possibility to visit the cave. No service. Beautiful village of Zueros 4 km.

title: (18249) Tózar - 2 Calle Nueva ag Tozar
description:
Level place/parking in rural village. Quiet to spent a night. Bakery comes in a van in the (late) morning (beeps).
Access very easy with any camper size. Other options also available around the village.
Free water tap with connector available on site, behind the building.

title: (14870) Zuheros - 305 Poligono PP-R1

title: (23711) Baños de la Encina -
description: (PRÓXIMA APERTURA) Área para autocaravanas, caravanas y camper. Contamos con zona de vaciado y llenado, aseos, puntos de luz, lavadero y lavandería.

title: (14870) Zuheros - 60 Calle Santo
description: Parking at the entrance of the village, dawn and very quiet. Nice place

title: (14870) Zuheros - CV-247
description: On the edge of the road, but with little passage, except some cars, mountain biking, hiker and shepherd, visit the cave or walk, CC good, no service.

title: (23711) Baños de la Encina - 3 Calle Donantes de Sangre
title_short: (23711) Baños de la Encina - 3 Calle Donantes de Sangre
description: Small pitch on ground, slightly sloping, next to a park with swings. If there are no other cars parked, two motorhomes enter. Good views of the city and the wall. Without any service (water, electricity ..), only parking.

title: (14870) Zuheros - 125 Poligono PP-R1
description: Cemetery parking, good place to visit Zuheros, and possibility of spending the night, although it is next to the road, it is not very busy

title: (23711) Baños de la Encina -
description: Great, largely shady place on the edge of the forest right on the reservoir. Depending on the water level, it is a few meters down to the shore, when the water level is full you are almost right on the water. In the morning completely shaded by the trees, during the day there are also sunny spots to sit or lie down. Fantastic nature that is rarely found in the area. The access is recommended via the upper of the two paths and is very bumpy with larger rocks, but also possible without a 4x4.

title: (23711) Baños de la Encina -
description: Small forest parking lot with a nice view of the castle and the forest. spent a very quiet night here. Not suitable for very large mobile homes. We have a T4. No services. Some rubbish all around so please take your rubbish with you. Thanks

title: (23748) Casas de El Encinarejo -
description: Quiet and beautiful place near the lake. Trash containers nearby, public toilet, beach, public tables and grill spots.

title: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 15 Calle San Luis
title_short: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 15 Calle San Luis
description: Parking in the city center, quite quiet, possibility of spending the night. No service, but no access problem in any case for vehicles of 7 m. A bit messy but free! Possibility of parking several motorhomes but I do not know the usual occupation during the week, but today the park is almost empty. Have a nice stay in Andalusia!

title: (23711) Baños de la Encina - Unnamed Road
title_short: (23711) Baños de la Encina - Unnamed Road
description: 5 minutes from the small village Baños de la encina, flat place overlooking the lake with incredible views.

title: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 27 Calle Libertad

title: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 22 Calle Ramón y Cajal
title_short: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 22 Calle Ramón y Cajal
description: 24-hour guarded parking very central, ideal for visiting Priego.

title: (18567) Domingo Pérez - Cam. Casa Nueva
description: Small shady spot (in the middle of the day) near a spring, with a bench for a picnic. Very quiet place below a hamlet. Please keep it clean: there is even a trash can, so there is no excuse for leaving your small papers and other waste on the floor!

title: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 0 Calle Huerto Almarcha
title_short: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 0 Calle Huerto Almarcha
description: Speed Queen automatic laundry. Very good laundry with recent equipment and very efficient. Cheap service. Only downside, difficult to park nearby.

name: Área autocaravanas Priego de Córdoba
title: (14800) Área autocaravanas Priego de Córdoba
description:
Area in Priego de Córdoba. 
Municipal free pitch with supply and disposal. The pitch is mostly very sloping. Quiet location next to a beautiful park. Shops and restaurants are located in the city center of 2 km. The area. There is no access in or out on Saturdays between 7am and 3pm due to market.

title: (23210) Guarromán - 285 Autovía del Sur
description: Rest area, gas station galp, with table to eat, drinking water source. It is next to the A4 motorway, heading south, the only drawback vehicles continually pass by.

title: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 66 Avenida D Niceto Alcalá Zamora y Torres
title_short: (14800) Priego de Córdoba - 66 Avenida D Niceto Alcalá Zamora y Torres
description:
Free space with services. Gray water, WC, water and cans. It is a quiet place.

The entrance passes through a park, it is at the fairgrounds.

About 20 minutes walk from the city center.

Access prohibited on Saturdays from 8 a.m. to 3 p.m.

address.street: 66 Avenida D Niceto Alcalá Zamora y Torres

title: (23748) Andújar - A-6177
description: Recreational area of "El Jabalí". Area a few kilometers from the sanctuary of the Virgen de la Cabeza. In the middle of Sierra Morena. Shaded areas, no water, with bins.

title: (23210) Guarromán - Ronda Urbana Norte
description: Motorway rest area with filling and emptying area. In the Cordoba - Albacete direction, on the A4 motorway, the gps takes exit 286 and takes a dirt road for about 2.5 km, it is better to exit at 283, the station is on the other on the motorway side, the area is at the back on the right. Good for the services.

name: Complejo La Mirada
title: (23748) Complejo La Mirada
description: Camping at the La look hotel. Privileged environment in front of the Sanctuary with spectacular views. Cozy family business. We went with a 7.5m motorhome, without space or maneuvering problems. Recommended 100%. near recreational areas such as Lugar Nuevo, Jabalí, Encinarejo.

title: (18247) Moclín - 71 Calle Real
description: Place to park and spend the night, without services, uneven but spacious and quiet, crowded on weekends as a parking lot for hikers.

title: (18247) Moclín - 8A Calle Mota
description: Passage in the narrow village

title: (18247) Moclín - 5 Carretera de Tiena
description: Parking by the side of a quiet road on the edge of the village. Stunning view across the plain towards the rising sun. From here you can visit the castle and also make the route of the PR A-84, called Ruta del Gollizno (derived from "gollizo": narrowness of a place).

title: (18247) Moclín - 8 Calle Hacho
description: Parking area in Moclín next to a public park, hermitage and the Post Office. There is no traffic as it is a dead end street. Allows maneuvering without difficulty.

title: (18247) Moclín - 16 Calle Hacho
description: Quiet parking, next to sports courts, beautiful views, level, without services

title: (18550) Iznalloz - 69D Barrio la Nava
description: Free water and air

title_short: (23210) Guarromán - 11 Calle Santa Mª de la Cabeza
